get.description: Gets a Kusto cluster.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

put.description: Create or update a Kusto cluster.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The Kusto cluster parameters supplied to the CreateOrUpdate operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the cluster. Omit this value to always overwrite the current cluster. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.

parameters.name: If-None-Match
parameters.description: Set to '*' to allow a new cluster to be created, but to prevent updating an existing cluster. Other values will result in a 412 Pre-condition Failed response.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

parameters.name: parameters
parameters.description: The Kusto cluster parameters supplied to the Update operation.

parameters.name: If-Match
parameters.description: The ETag of the cluster. Omit this value to always overwrite the current cluster. Specify the last-seen ETag value to prevent accidentally overwriting concurrent changes.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

default.description: Error response describing why the operation failed.

provisioningState.description: The provisioned state of the resource.

stateReason.description: The reason for the cluster's current state.

enableDiskEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster's disks are encrypted.

enableStreamingIngest.description: A boolean value that indicates if the streaming ingest is enabled.

keyVaultProperties.description: KeyVault properties for the cluster encryption.

enablePurge.description: A boolean value that indicates if the purge operations are enabled.

languageExtensions.description: List of the cluster's language extensions.

enableDoubleEncryption.description: A boolean value that indicates if double encryption is enabled.

publicNetworkAccess.description: Public network access to the cluster is enabled by default. When disabled, only private endpoint connection to the cluster is allowed

allowedIpRangeList.description: The list of ips in the format of CIDR allowed to connect to the cluster.

enableAutoStop.description: A boolean value that indicates if the cluster could be automatically stopped (due to lack of data or no activity for many days).

restrictOutboundNetworkAccess.description: Whether or not to restrict outbound network access.  Value is optional but if passed in, must be 'Enabled' or 'Disabled'

allowedFqdnList.description: List of allowed FQDNs(Fully Qualified Domain Name) for egress from Cluster.

items.description: FQDN to be allowed for egress. Example: my-storageaccount.blob.core.windows.net

ClusterProperties.description: Class representing the Kusto cluster properties.

value.description: GUID representing an external tenant.

TrustedExternalTenant.description: Represents a tenant ID that is trusted by the cluster.

capacity.description: The number of instances of the cluster.

default.description: The default capacity that would be used.

zones.description: The available zone of the SKU.

dataManagementPublicIpId.description: Data management's service public IP address resource id.

size.description: The database size - the total size of compressed data and index in bytes.

tablesToInclude.description: List of tables to include in the follower database

tablesToExclude.description: List of tables to exclude from the follower database

externalTablesToInclude.description: List of external tables to include in the follower database

externalTablesToExclude.description: List of external tables exclude from the follower database

materializedViewsToInclude.description: List of materialized views to include in the follower database

materializedViewsToExclude.description: List of materialized views exclude from the follower database

TableLevelSharingProperties.description: Tables that will be included and excluded in the follower database

value.description: GUID or valid URL representing an accepted audience.

AcceptedAudiences.description: Represents an accepted audience trusted by the cluster.

SubscriptionIdParameter.name: subscriptionId
SubscriptionIdParameter.description: Gets subscription credentials which uniquely identify Microsoft Azure subscription. The subscription ID forms part of the URI for every service call.

ClusterNameParameter.name: clusterName
ClusterNameParameter.description: The name of the Kusto cluster.

AttachedDatabaseConfigurationNameParamet.name: attachedDatabaseConfigurationName
AttachedDatabaseConfigurationNameParamet.description: The name of the attached database configuration.

ResourceGroupParameter.name: resourceGroupName
ResourceGroupParameter.description: The name of the resource group containing the Kusto cluster.

DatabaseNameParameter.name: databaseName
DatabaseNameParameter.description: The name of the database in the Kusto cluster.

DataConnectionNameParameter.name: dataConnectionName
DataConnectionNameParameter.description: The name of the data connection.

PrincipalAssignmentNameParameter.name: principalAssignmentName
PrincipalAssignmentNameParameter.description: The name of the Kusto principalAssignment.

ScriptNameParameter.name: scriptName
ScriptNameParameter.description: The name of the Kusto database script.

OperationIdParameter.name: operationId
OperationIdParameter.description: The Guid of the operation ID

PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.name: privateEndpointConnectionName
PrivateEndpointConnectionNameParameter.description: The name of the private endpoint connection.

PrivateLinkResourceNameParameter.name: privateLinkResourceName
PrivateLinkResourceNameParameter.description: The name of the private link resource.

ManagedPrivateEndpointNameParameter.name: managedPrivateEndpointName
ManagedPrivateEndpointNameParameter.description: The name of the managed private endpoint.
